incidents.name: Identified: Activity Reports is unavailable for some customers is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Activity reports are now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Activity reports should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've addressed the issue that caused Identified: Activity Reports is unavailable for some customers to be unavailable since 9:04 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jul 31, 2024. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

incidents.name: Integration Products are currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Between 11:30 PM EDT on June 6 and 11:30 AM EDT on June 7, some customers experienced Slack, Salesforce, Microsoft Teams, QuickBooks, Shopify, SurveyMonkey, and GoToWebinar integration delays, webhooks execution delays, and app log access issues. The root cause has been resolved. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we resolved the issue.

We've addressed the issue that's caused Slack, Salesforce, Microsoft Teams, QuickBooks, Shopify, SurveyMonkey, and GoToWebinar integration delays, webhooks execution delays, and app log access issues. We’re monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

We've identified the issue that's caused Slack, Salesforce, Microsoft Teams, QuickBooks, Shopify, SurveyMonkey, and GoToWebinar integration delays, webhooks execution delays, and app log access issues since 11:30 PM EDT on June 6. We will provide an update once we've addressed the issue.

incident_updates.body: Between 06:55 AM & 07:10 AM EST on June 5, the Marketing Email Editor tool wasn't loading for some customers. We've identified and addressed the issue. The incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Web analytics is currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Web analytics is no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 9:57 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on May 28, 2024. The issue is now fully resolved.
Reports should be full caught up now. We're monitoring the tools closely to make sure that all processes recover properly.
Most data should now be caught up. Only the Pages and Topics Clusters reports are still delayed.
Some delays have been resolved. But important systems like contact updates from web activities are still delayed.
We are continuing to work on resolving the delays in web analytics. We will share updates as we get new information about time to recover.

We've identified the cause of the Web analytics delays of up to 2 hours since 9:57 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on May 28, 2024. These delays may impact tools such as Lists, Workflows, Lead Scoring, chat widget, audience targeting, custom event ingestion, and campaign reporting in HubSpot.

Our Office 365 Add-in for the Outlook for Windows app isn't available right now. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: List processing is currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Between 11:30 AM EST and 1:30 PM EST on April 29, 2024, some customers experienced list processing delays that impacted tools such as workflow enrollments and action execution and list membership processing. The root cause has been resolved, and no data was lost. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we resolved the issue.

List processing in HubSpot is experiencing delays. This may impact tools such as workflow enrollments and action execution and list membership processing in HubSpot. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

incidents.name: HubSpot is currently experiencing loading delays in Eastern Europe

incident_updates.body: HubSpot software is now working for all users located in Eastern Europe. We've identified and addressed the cause of the issue with our content delivery network provider, Cloudflare, to resolve it. More updates: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/fjh89m55qxt7. The incident has now been fully resolved. No data was lost.

We are investigating a performance issue impacting HubSpot customers located in Eastern Europe. We are working with our content delivery network provider, Cloudflare, to resolve it. More updates: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/fjh89m55qxt7

incidents.name: HubSpot is currently unavailable for some customers.

incident_updates.body: HubSpot is now working for all users. HubSpot experienced brief service disruptions from 10:15 to 10:35 AM EST (UTC-5), and 11:53 AM to 12:00 PM EST, affecting HubSpot CRM, Marketing, Sales, and Service tools. All issues have been resolved. No data was lost, and no action is needed from your end. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Earlier today, HubSpot had a brief service disruption from 10:15 to 10:35 AM ET (UTC-5), affecting Marketing, Sales, Service, and CRM tools. We've resolved this issue, and we're monitoring the situation for stability. No data was lost, and no action is needed from you. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
HubSpot was unavailable for some users from 10:15 to 10:35 AM ET (UTC -5). Our team has identified and resolved the root cause of this issue. We are now monitoring the situation.

incidents.name: Notification links were blocked on the Chrome browser for some users

incident_updates.body: Between 1:25 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 16, 2024 and 12:45 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 18, 2024, some customers experienced issues with Notification links. These links were being blocked on the Chrome browser preventing users from reaching the link destination. As of 12:45 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 18, 2024, Notification links on the Chrome browser are working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Workflows was unavailable for some users

incident_updates.body:
Between 1:40 PM EST (UTC -05:00) and 4:06 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 4, 2024, some customers experienced issues with Workflows. This caused the "enroll existing records" choice to not enroll records as expected. We have identified and fixed the underlying cause of this issue.
As of 4:06 PM EST the "enroll existing records" choice is working correctly for newly enabled or edited workflows. All previously impacted workflows will be processed automatically without actions needed from customers. To avoid records being enrolled twice, please do not manually retry workflows.

incident_updates.body: Phone number acquisition and first time calling is available again for all European customers.

Phone number acquisition and first time calling is unavailable right now for some European customers. We’ve identified the cause of this issue as an outage with Twilio, a cloud calling and messaging platform. 

A resolution is currently in progress, and we appreciate your patience. You can also monitor Twilio's status directly via this link: https://status.twilio.com/

incidents.name: Lists data is incorrect for all customers on the EU data center

incident_updates.body:
Lists data is now fully correct for all customers, including those on the EU data center. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and lists, as well as workflows and emails that rely on lists, should be working properly.

The impact was limited to customers on the EU data center, customers can confirm if they are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

We've addressed the issue that caused lists data to be incorrect for customers on the EU data center since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023. You can confirm if you are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

Workflow enrollment was paused for customers on the EU data center from 7:20 PM EDT to 9:10 PM EDT. Workflow enrollments from 4:00 PM EDT to 7:20 PM EDT may have been incorrect. 

Batch email sends were paused for customers on the EU data center from 8:10 PM EDT to 9:18 PM EDT. Batch email sends from 4:00 PM EDT to 8:10 PM EDT may have been incorrect. Other email types were sent continuously.

We're monitoring performance closely to make sure the tools recover properly.

We've identified the issue that's caused lists data to be incorrect for customers on the EU data center since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023. You can confirm if you are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

Workflow enrollment for customers on the EU data center was paused starting at at 7:20 PM EDT to limit impact. Batch email sends were paused for customers on the EU data center starting at 8:10 PM EDT. Other email types will still be sent.

CRM objects may not be visible from CRM index pages and form submissions may not be visible in HubSpot for some customers on the EU data center.

We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

We've identified the issue that's caused lists data to be incorrect for customers on the EU data center since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023. You can confirm if you are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

Workflow enrollment for customers on the EU data center was paused starting at at 7:20 PM EDT to limit impact. Batch email sends were paused for customers on the EU data center starting at 8:10 PM EDT. Other email types will still be sent.

We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

We've identified the issue that's caused lists data to be incorrect for customers on the EU data center since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023.

incidents.name: Some marketing emails experienced elevated soft bounce rates from October 16th to the 24th

incident_updates.body: From Oct 16, 2023 to Oct 24, 2023, some customers experienced marketing email delivery issues to Outlook. As of 10:00 AM (UTC -04:00) EDT Oct 24, 2023, newly sent marketing emails should be delivered properly. For customers who had soft-bounced email sends, we won’t be re-sending emails to those contacts. If you wish to re-send emails to those contacts, you can create a list from the “Bounced” emails under the “Recipients” from your email, and re-send the email to this list following these instructions: https://knowledge.hubspot.com/email/how-do-i-resend-an-email.

incidents.name: Call quality is degraded for some Mac users

incident_updates.body: Calling quality issues on MacOs Sonoma & Chrome are now resolved. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Calling should be working properly for affected users. No data was lost.

We've discovered that some users who have upgraded to MacOS Sonoma and using Google Chrome for calling are experiencing degraded call quality. 

If the user has already upgraded to Sonoma, we recommend using a non-chromium browser like Mozilla FireFox, or using the "Call my Phone" option. 

We're investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Some Workflow Enrollments are delayed

incident_updates.body: Workflow enrollments are no longer experiencing delays. The issue is now fully resolved and all previously delayed workflows have gone through enrollments as expected.
We’ve identified the cause of the workflow enrollment delay. We’re actively addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page  when we have more information.
Starting around 11:20am ET, some workflow enrollments have been delayed. We're investigating the cause of the issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Some new contacts from Forms are temporarily not being set as marketing contacts.

incident_updates.body: New contacts created through Forms are now correctly being marked as marketing contacts. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and should be working properly. No data has been lost. We are updating any contacts that were not set correctly.

New contacts created through Forms are now correctly being marked as marketing contacts. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and should be working properly. No data has been lost. We are updating any contacts that were not set correctly.

incidents.name: Intermittent serverless function outages

incident_updates.body: The intermittent serverless function outages that occurred on October 5th, 2023 have now been resolved.

There have been two intermittent serverless function outages on October 5th, 2023. The first outage occurred from 5:50 AM EST to 6:24 AM EST, and the second incident took place from 11:21 AM EST to 11:34 AM EST. During both of these outages, all serverless function executions failed. We are currently investigating the root cause.

incidents.name: Some marketing emails experienced elevated soft bounce rates

incident_updates.body: Between 11:49 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 28, 2023 and 3:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 1, 2023, some customers experienced marketing email delivery issues to certain email service providers. This was caused by an update to our email-sending infrastructure. As of 3:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 1, 2023, newly sent marketing emails should be delivered properly and the incident has been fully resolved. For customers who had soft-bounced email sends, we won't be re-sending emails to those contacts. If you wish to re-send emails to those contacts, you can create a list from the "Bounced" emails under the "Recipients" from your email, and re-send the email to this list following these instructions https://knowledge.hubspot.com/email/how-do-i-resend-an-email.

components.name: Marketing Tools
components.description: Loading and data processing of Marketing tools like Ads, Email, Social, Forms and Lists.

incidents.name: Meeting availability is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body:
Google Workspace has identified and addressed the issue affecting Google Calendar. The incident has been fully resolved and calendar availability and calendar connections are working properly. No data was lost.

As part of this incident, notifications were sent to HubSpot users of impacted calendars letting them know that someone tried to book time with them. Since these meetings were not automatically booked, these users should reach out to their contact(s) to confirm their meeting time.

Additionally, prospects may not have received reminder emails for upcoming meetings. Reminders from this timeframe will not be sent retroactively, however, future reminder emails will now be sent as expected.

Google Workspace Update: https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/7uJZ5F1Uy4n1n74iMacQ

Google Workspace is monitoring the fix to an issue affecting Google Calendar that caused meeting availability and new calendar connections to be unavailable for some users since 9:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 21, 2023. While this issue should be resolved for some users, we are continuing to check progress with Google Workspace until the issue is fully resolved. Customers who are having issues loading their calendar may be able to fix this by refreshing their browser.

Google Workspace Status Page: https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/7uJZ5F1Uy4n1n74iMacQ

Google Workspace is monitoring the fix to an issue affecting Google Calendar that caused meeting availability and new calendar connections to be unavailable for some users since 9:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 21, 2023. While this issue should be resolved for the majority of users, we are continuing to check progress with Google Workspace until the issue is fully resolved. Customers who are having issues loading their calendar may be able to fix this by refreshing their browser.

Google Workspace Status Page: https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/7uJZ5F1Uy4n1n74iMacQ

Google Workspace has identified an issue affecting Google Calendar. It has caused meeting availability and new calendar connections to be unavailable for some users since 9:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 21, 2023. We are monitoring progress with Google Workspace until the issue is resolved.

Google Workspace Status Page: https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/7uJZ5F1Uy4n1n74iMacQ

Some calendars are not showing correct availability when booking meetings. Some customers may see meeting requests instead of meetings being automatically booked. They may also experience errors when trying to connect a new calendar. We're investigating the issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Multiple HubSpot processes including logins and page loads  is currently delayed for all customers

incident_updates.body: Page loading and login  is no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 10:18 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 20, 2023 as a problem with an internal database. The issue is now fully resolved.

We've addressed the issue that was causing delayings in page loading and login delays of up to 3 minutes starting at 10:18 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 20, 2023. We're monitoring the tools closely to ensure all processes recover properly.

We've identified the cause of delays to multiple HubSpot processes, including logins and page loading. Users may experience delays of up to 3 min since 10:18 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 20, 2023. These delays may impact tools such as Calling, CRM, and Login in HubSpot. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

incident_updates.body: Between 12:27 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 13, 2023 and 12:30 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 13, 2023, some customers experienced issues with HubSpot. This was caused by an internal system issue. As of 12:45 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 13, 2023, HubSpot is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

incidents.name: Global Search may be partially unavailable for all customers

incident_updates.body: The issue impacting global search has been fixed. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 11:10 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jul 27, 2023 as a problem with unconventional spike in traffic. The issue is now fully resolved.

Global Search results in HubSpot may be partially unavailable for all customers. This may impact getting any result or certain categories from Global Search. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue.

incidents.name: HubSpot is currently unavailable for some customers.

incident_updates.body: HubSpot is now working for all users. We identified and addressed the root cause of the issue that prevented HubSpot from loading, and the issue is fully resolved. No data was lost.
We've addressed the issue that prevented HubSpot from loading beginning at 10:05 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jul 19, 2023. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the software recovers properly.

We've addressed the issue that caused Custom Lifecycle Stage property to be unavailable since 2:43 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jul 11, 2023. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

incident_updates.body: Sequence enrollment is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Sequence enrollment should be working properly. No data was lost.
We've addressed the issue that caused sequence enrollment to be unavailable since 10:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jun 24, 2023. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

incidents.name: Issues with HubSpot login.

incident_updates.body: HubSpot software is now working for all users. We identified the cause of the issue as an outage with Cloudflare. The incident has now been fully resolved.

Cloudflare has resolved the outage preventing some HubSpot customers from logging in. 

We’re monitoring performance closely to ensure the software recovers properly.

A Cloudflare outage is preventing some HubSpot customers from logging in. Cloudfare has identified the issue and are working to resolve it:

https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/xb8vfgd0bs53

incidents.name: Create [object] forms  are not saving properly for some users

incident_updates.body: Changes to Conditional Logic on record creation forms are now saving properly. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and record creation forms should be working properly.
Conditional logic on record creation forms isn’t saving properly right now. We’re investigating what’s causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Email and calendar integrations with Outlook 365 are partially unavailable for all customers

incident_updates.body: Email and calendar integrations with Outlook 365 are now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and everything should be working properly. No data was lost.

Email and calendar integrations with Outlook 365 are partially unavailable for all customers since 3:30 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jun 5, 2023. Meetings users may see slowness loading scheduling pages and errors when attempting to book meetings. Email users may experience trouble connecting inboxes and delays in sending and syncing emails. We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.
